text: @realDonaldTrump Dear #TrumpDumbAss.  U do know U are tacitly admitting that Hillary Clinton won the popular vote. FACT, U lost the popular vote by 2,865,075.  So bitching about mail-in ballots means U KNOW U will lose the popular AND electoral college. Mr.Incompetent,who killed 100K with covid19
